title: Any Indian Youtubers/Channels like Johnny Harris?
selftext:
I’m trying to find Youtube channels similar to Johnny Harris’ channel that are more focused on our country or are from our country. I’ve discovered channels that lack good production capabilities, but their content is generally of higher quality. Or channels with better/consistent production that is lacking elsewhere. For people unfamiliar with his channel, here’s a [link](https://youtube.com/@johnnyharris). 

His brand of independent journalism and storytelling is compelling and definitely has led me down quite a few rabbit holes. I agree, he’s made a few videos that could be taught as lessons about finding the line between being informative and a good storyteller. But largely, they’re well-researched and well-made. Whether you agree with his political inclinations, methods of research, and views is your choice. I’m just trying to find something I know I’ll find interesting, and maybe someone else might too.
